metadata.title: CVE-2022-48709 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ice:switch: fix potential memleak in ice_add_adv_recipe() Whenice_add_special_words() fails, the 'rm' is not released, which will lead toa memory leak. Fix this up by going to 'err_unroll' label. Compile testedonly.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
